Definitely recommending Physio 32 to everyone I know who needs any sort of dental help going forward.

**** **** ******* very much satisfied. I was very well explained the details and procedure before the treatment,

review: Well experience Dr more than 17 yrs experience in his profession,, excilant nature with patients , once he attend patients, patient wil never forget him,,in his profession he is very expertise and  he updated always new technology, taking care of patients as a family member.I knew him more than 15 yrs ,very trustworthy Dr.
reply_text:
Thank you for your kind words. 
Appreciate it.

review:
I had a gap in my front teeth and I wanted it closed,the doctor and his staff took to describe all the options from braces to veneers to cosmetic composite build up.
I went for the cosmetic composite build up.
The gap was closed within an hour and I could smile without being conscious.
Thank you team Creating Smiles. 
;) ;) ;)

I had a v bad gum problem with bad breath. 
Dr. Parag diagnosed me with periodontitis (gum infection).
 He advised a minor gum surgery. 
After the procedure the problem of bleeding gums and bad breath disappeared.
I will recommend Dr. Parag to my friends & family.

Very good. 
Treatment was done for my 4 year old kid.
He was in pain since a week.
We visited a pedodontist & he suggested root canal under general anesthesia and scared us. 
Dr. Parag managed the kid well and the treatment was done under local anesthesia to our relief.
Thank you so much team Dr. Parag.

context: Ceramic Crowns and Bridges Fixing,Implant Prosthesis,Root Canal Treatment (RCT),
review:
Patient of Dr.Parag  shah since last 12 years. I have done 3 root canals, 2 extractions. Very happy with his treatment.
I am here now for implants And the implant surgery was smooth.

4 root canals done here 9 years back.
I have had no problems till today.
I am here now for a regular check up.
Gentle hands & minimal pain is how I would describe my experience here.
reply_text: shukriya narayanji

review:
Went for a cavity for a front tooth. 
It was blacker by the day.
Dr. Parag advised a cosmetic filling .
1sitting and my tooth looked as good as original.

I had a decayed tooth and was bearing the pain because of my fear of dental treatment.
I visited Dr.Parag, he advised a root canal and extraction.
Both procedures were done in 2 separate sittings and I felt minimal pain.
Thank you Dr.Parag.

I visited Dr. Parag shah with cavities in my front teeth. I was very conscious about them, I hesitated while smiling.
He did a fantastic job filling them. 
I wish I could post photos here.
Definitely recommend Dr. Parag for cosmetic dentistry.
reply_text: thank you sana

review: I am 66 years old and had a fractured tooth. The extraction was done very smoothly and there was no pain during the procedure.

Single sitting root canal and the pain vanished.
This is my 3rd root canal.
My entire family visits Creating Smiles.
Definite yes to Dr.Parag for root canals.

Dr is very good and gentle towards his patients. .he gave us proper advice n the treatment for the problem we were having.
Thank you

I had pain with a molar. I had this trouble since a month.
Single sitting Root canal was done and a cap placed over it. And now I can eat everything with that tooth. 
Thumbs up for Dr. Parag Shah.
It was a good experience all together. Root canal is good till date. I didn't felt dentist is doing a root canal on my teeth. Thank you
Excellent!!! Very comforting and friendly. My problems very rightly addressed and explained to me. A must recommendation!!!

Root canal 8 years back. No problem at all even now.
I underwent a wisdom tooth surgery recently, it went smooth with no pain.
My entire family visits Dr. Parag.

I am 75 years old and I have been visiting Dr. Parag shah since the last 8 years.
He has done my root canals as well as some caps over my teeth over the years and they are all fine till date.
All the treatment was painless.
Thank you.

I have done  my full mouth treatment at creating smiles about 6 years back and have been having no problems whatsoever.
Now I am back to replace my lower denture as the older one is worn out.
I would definitely recommend Dr. Parag for denture work.

Friendly advise and took very good care of my 4 yr old. The pain and swelling relieved In a Couple of days.
And my kid enjoyed the treatment.
